<a name="DeliveryLog"></a>
## type [DeliveryLog](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/job/job.go#L45-L54>)

DeliveryLog captures the HTTP request/response performed while processing a job

```go
type DeliveryLog struct {
    ID         uuid.UUID
    JobID      uuid.UUID
    Endpoint   string
    Request    map[string]any
    Response   map[string]any
    StatusCode *int
    DurationMS *int
    CreatedAt  time.Time
}
```

<a name="Job"></a>
## type [Job](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/job/job.go#L28-L42>)

Job represents the execution of one reaction for one trigger

```go
type Job struct {
    ID            uuid.UUID
    TriggerID     uuid.UUID
    AreaLinkID    uuid.UUID
    Status        Status
    Attempt       int
    RunAt         time.Time
    LockedBy      *string
    LockedAt      *time.Time
    InputPayload  map[string]any
    ResultPayload map[string]any
    Error         *string
    CreatedAt     time.Time
    UpdatedAt     time.Time
}
```

<a name="Status"></a>
## type [Status](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/job/job.go#L10>)

Status mirrors the job\_status enum in the database

```go
type Status string
```

<a name="StatusQueued"></a>

```go
const (
    // StatusQueued indicates that the job is ready to be processed
    StatusQueued Status = "queued"
    // StatusRunning indicates that the job is currently being processed
    StatusRunning Status = "running"
    // StatusSucceeded indicates that the job completed successfully
    StatusSucceeded Status = "succeeded"
    // StatusFailed indicates that the job finished with a non-retriable error
    StatusFailed Status = "failed"
    // StatusCanceled indicates that the job was canceled by the system or user
    StatusCanceled Status = "canceled"
    // StatusRetrying indicates that the job will be retried
    StatusRetrying Status = "retrying"
)
```
